featured.text: Performers usually play on a tall stage with lanterns and banners strung all around.
They came from northwest England, the blackened heart of the Industrial Revolution: Its main street was “a dark, unattractive hole” and the river running through it was a string of dirty water.

definition.zh_def: 一系列字符的集合，通常用於表示文本或數據。
definition.en_def: A sequence of characters, typically used to represent text or data.
definition.example: She used a string of letters to create a password.
